messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: If you feel that we deserve strong leadership and real change then please look at what UKIP has to offer. We can win in Northfield - with your help. Having run my own small business in the City for over 35 years, I know the economic issues. I offer common sense policies, putting you first. Saving the vast sums spent on the EU, foreign aid and other wasteful projects and spending it here at home on the NHS and on our communities. I am fully committed to standing up for Northfield and for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our EU membership fee.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: Saving the vast sums spent on the EU.

leaflet.personalStatement: Having run my own small business in the City for over 35 years, I know the economic issues. I offer common sense policies, putting you first.

contactInformation.address: Peter Hughes on behalf of KEITH ROWE, 428 St Marys Road, Oldbury, B68 8JG.

images.caption: Image of Keith Rowe with the UKIP logo and messaging including 'Standing Up for Real Change', 'BELIEVE in BRITAIN' and key policy areas such as 'Control our borders', 'Fairer tax system', 'Invest in the NHS', and 'Spend here, not abroad'.
